description: Try our easy to follow Roast Leg of Lamb with Lemon Risoni recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast lamb,Roast,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Lamb,Lemon,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Roast Leg of Lamb with Lemon Risoni Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a roasting pan with baking paper. Place lamb in pan.
Combine mustard, honey, garlic and oil. Brush mixture all over lamb. Sprinkle with rosemary.
Roast for 1 hour 20 minutes, for medium or until cooked to your liking. Transfer lamb to a carving board and cover loosely with foil. Set aside to rest for about 10 minutes.

Meanwhile, cook risoni in a large saucepan of boiling, salted water for about 5 minutes or until just tender. Drain and return to pan. Add oil, parsley, lemon rind and juice. Toss with a fork to combine. Cover to keep warm.
